page.title: 07LEISURE Flora and Fauna.
page.content: WILD FLOWERS. Many wild flowers are found in the country park some of the more common ones are bluebells, foxgloves, deadly nightshade, wood anemones, birdsfoot trefoil and red campion just to mention a few. Four types of orchid to be found are the bee orchid,the pyramidal orchid,the lesser spotted and the butterfly orchid.Cowslips and oxlips are also found there.The cowslip,once a very common flower,is now rarely found.The warden said that it is thought that it is because people picked large amounts to make into wine. It is illegal to pick or dig up wild flowers.
